name: Minitank Shooter
description:
Minitank Shooter Build 0.2 (Temporary Name)

Procedurally generated top down shooter. Navigate your way through the maze and defeat the boss to win. Use powers to sruvive, and pick up and change to different guns and hulls like Gatling Gun, Laser Gun, Heavy Armor, Hovercraft etc. to help you survive.

Find the boss in each floor to proceed! (Currently only 1 floor)

Supports Local Co-op using Keyboard and/or Gamepad.
